name: piwigo-bootstrap-darkroom
description: A Piwigo theme based on Bootstrap 4
author: Thomas Kuther

scripts.css-compile: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 scss/bootstrap-darkroom.scss css/bootstrap-darkroom.css && node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 scss/bootstrap-darkroom-core.scss theme.css && node-sass --include-path node_modules --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 scss/material-darkroom.scss css/material-colors/material-darkroom/bootstrap-material-design.css
scripts.build-material:js: pushd components/bootstrap-material-design; npm install && npm run build:js && sed -i '/^\/dist/d' .gitignore; popd
scripts.build-material:css: for i in deep-purple purple teal; do node-sass --include-path node_modules --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 scss/material-${i}.scss css/material-colors/${i}/bootstrap-material-design.css && postcss --config components/bootstrap/build/postcss.config.js --replace css/material-colors/${i}/bootstrap-material-design.css && cleancss --level 1 --source-map --source-map-inline-sources --output css/material-colors/${i}/bootstrap-material-design.min.css css/material-colors/${i}/bootstrap-material-design.css; done
